Articles.Content:
is there a way to specifiy multiple stackSymmetry definitions?

like, if my part can allow 1,2,4, or 8 but not 3 or 6

I guess not. why doesn't Squad use a binary flag system in the cfg file instead?

    // stackSymmetry rules: 2,3,4,6,8stackSymmetry = 1,0,1,0,1  // 3 and 6 disallowed

> 
> I guess not. why doesn't Squad use a binary flag system in the cfg file instead?

Because plugins like [Editor Extensions](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/38768) enable even higher orders of stack symmetry (i.e. more than 8)
